com.rohanclan.cfml.editors.dnd
Class AnnotationPosition

java.lang.Object
  com.rohanclan.cfml.editors.dnd.AnnotationPosition
public class AnnotationPosition
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Stephen Milligan This class keeps track of the position of an annotation so that it can be replaced after a document change such as an internal drag and drop event.

Constructor Summary
